_metadata.description: Cheap, fast static analysis using Makefile integration and file metrics

requirements.title: Makefile integration for lint execution
requirements.description: Execute `make lint` for any scenario with a Makefile and capture full output
requirements.notes: Must handle scenarios without Makefile gracefully (skip or warn)

requirements.title: Makefile integration for type checking
requirements.description: Execute `make type` for any scenario with a Makefile and capture full output
requirements.notes: Parse typescript and Go type errors into structured format

requirements.title: Lint output parser
requirements.description: Parse lint outputs into structured issues with scenario, file path, line/column, message, and tool

requirements.title: Type output parser
requirements.description: Parse type checker outputs into structured issues
requirements.notes: Support typescript tsc and Go type errors

requirements.title: File metrics - line counting
requirements.description: Compute per-file line counts for all source files matching configurable glob patterns

requirements.title: File metrics - long file flagging
requirements.description: Flag files exceeding configurable line count threshold as 'long file' issues

requirements.title: Light scan performance - small scenarios
requirements.description: Light scans for scenarios <50 files must complete in under 60 seconds
requirements.notes: CLI scan command wired, performance tests passing (picker-wheel completes in 0s)

requirements.title: Light scan performance - medium scenarios
requirements.description: Light scans for scenarios <200 files must complete in under 120 seconds
requirements.notes: CLI scan command wired, performance tests passing (tidiness-manager completes in 2s)
